item.title: My First Post
item.description: Its about time I made a blog ðŸ”—I’ve thought about creating a blog for some time now and I think it’s high time I finally do. I will use this space to write about just about anything I find interesting and just so happens I find quite a lot interesting. So this should be fun. I dont expect anyone else to read my posts let alone take interest so this will always be for myself.
